description: Detects python spawning a pretty tty which could be indicative of potential reverse shell activity
author: Nextron Systems
name: Python Spawning Pretty TTY
query: (((process.executable:(/.*\/[Pp][Yy][Tt][Hh][Oo][Nn]/ OR /.*\/[Pp][Yy][Tt][Hh][Oo][Nn]2/ OR /.*\/[Pp][Yy][Tt][Hh][Oo][Nn]3/)) OR (process.executable:(/.*\/[Pp][Yy][Tt][Hh][Oo][Nn]2\..*/ OR /.*\/[Pp][Yy][Tt][Hh][Oo][Nn]3\..*/))) AND (((process.command_line:/.*[Ii][Mm][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt]\ [Pp][Tt][Yy].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\.[Ss][Pp][Aa][Ww][Nn]\(.*/)) OR (process.command_line:/.*[Ff][Rr][Oo][Mm]\ [Pp][Tt][Yy]\ [Ii][Mm][Pp][Oo][Rr][Tt]\ [Ss][Pp][Aa][Ww][Nn].*/)))
